description: This file defines a Next.js page component for displaying detailed information about a specific recipe, including metadata generation, static parameter generation, rendering recipe details, and integrating a reviews section.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Generates static parameters for each recipe ID for dynamic routing.

methods.name: generateMetadata
methods.description: Fetches recipe data to generate page metadata such as title and description.

methods.name: RecipeDetail
methods.description: Main React component to display detailed recipe information, including image, metadata, ingredients, instructions, and reviews.
